messages.title: Empty promises and no record of action
messages.content: Labour have failed to clean up Parliament after the scandal of MPs' expenses. Gordon Brown's Labour can't be trusted.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Fairer taxes that put money back in your pocket
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Pay no tax on the first £10,000 you earn – cutting most tax bills by £700.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: A fair chance for every child
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Smaller class sizes, more cash for schools and abolish university tuition fees.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: A fair future: creating jobs by making Britain greener
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Invest in public transport, renewable energy and energy efficient homes.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: A fair deal for you from the politicians
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Make politicians accountable and give you the right to sack corrupt MPs.

mentions.candidate: Jenny Willott has fought hard against Labour's Post Office closures.

endorsements.endorsement: Resigned in protest at the chronic lack of funding and resources for British troops in Afghanistan.

quotes.text: The Labour Government's most shocking failure is the way they have treated our brave men and women in uniform.

images.caption: Britain's Armed Forces deserve a fair deal
